overview_of_class: Fall 2017 Prof. Chloe Thurston This seminar offers a broad introduction to qualitative and archival methods in political science. The emphasis is on what are methods for the analysis of a relatively small number of cases. The course focuses on recent writings, though a few classical pieces are also included. The readings are not specific to any substantive subfield in political science. The course assumes no prior background in qualitative methodology.
name: Qualitative Methods
title: WCAS POLI_SCI 495-0-20 Qualitative Methods
